reasoning: Extremely rare genetic disorder (CDG-1q/SRD5A3-CDG) with <100 cases reported worldwide. Estimated <0.01 per 100k births based on case report frequency. No systematic population-based epidemiological data available.
source: Cantagrel V et al. (2010). SRD5A3 is required for converting polyprenol to dolichol and is mutated in a congenital glycosylation disorder. Cell. 142(2):203-17
